title: John Carpenter's HALLOWEEN Limited Edition 2-DVD
description:
Halloween Limited Edition - Anchor Bay

DVD 1 Features:

*Widescreen Presentation (2.35.1) enhanced for 16x9 TV's
*Full-Frame Presentation reformatted to fit 4x3 TV's
*Original Theatrical Trailers
*Television Spots
*Radio Spots
*Talent Bios
*Still and Poster Gallery
*Behind-the-Scenes Still Gallery
*Halloween Unmasked 2000 - Produced and Directed by Mark Ceruli

DVD 2 Features:

*Halloween Television Version Widescreen Presentation (2.35.1) enhanced for 16x9 TV's (Includes 12 minutes of additional scenes)

Nothing has been compressed or removed. DVD 1 will require a DVD-9. DVD 2 will fit on a DVD-5. Or you can mount and watch any time on the computer.

I hope you enjoy, Happy Halloween, and please seed!
